chapter.title: Configuration Process IPS sensors
chapter.para: The process of installation and registration of the sensors consist of the following phases:

listitem.para: Download and install the redBorder IPS solution and basic settings.
b) Creation of bonding or port and interface assignment management.
c) Configuration of segments or network interfaces on the placed sensors.
Registration of the sensors in Manager.

section.title: Download and install redBorder IPS and basic settings
Basic Settings
section.para: RedBorder’s installation of its IPS solution comprises a quick series of basic settings:
To begin the installation process and to perform basic settings of the installer, which allows the configuration of the Manager, you must select option 1 Install Manager Community IPS.
Choose the language in which want to operate from now
Choose the type of keyboard you want to use during the process. The US keyboard appears by default [US] because of its ranging compatibility.
Selection System is configured by default in the UTC time zone to avoid mismatches between sensors. Both systems use public encryption key, very sensitive to any temporal variation.
In this case, you can select the range that corresponds to your local time or one that will be most useful for tracking events.
Select and enter a password.This will be the key with which you operate from now on. It can be modified at any time.
Confirm Passwordby re-entering the password for verify that you know your password and there aren't typos. If the password is weak or low strength, the program will warn you via a popup window.
You can change it later by selecting3 Password, accessible from the configuration menu.
Once you have entered your password and you press the OK button, the system will proceed to create partitions and to install wizard packages on your hard drive.

section.title: Installing packages and reboot
section.para: Once you have inserted the password, proceed to “installation” of the redBorder solution.
Wait until the progress bar tells you that the installation was 100% complete. This process can take up to several minutes.
Once the package is installed, the program startsrecent scripts to finish this stage. Then begins automatic restart.
